title: Love Rocks
description: Desperate for a way to pay her mounting bills, Bennie McAllen does something she's certain she'll live to regret—she auditions for reality dating series Love Rocks. She isn’t looking for love…until she meets the show’s bachelor, Nate Jericho. To win the competition—and Nate—she’ll have to overcome her shyness and feelings of inferiority. As she tries to navigate the minefield that is Love Rocks, she comes to realize just how much she has to lose…and just how much winning could cost her.
author: L.B. Clark
